data.title: Languages CLI Provides Interpreters For by Country
data.meta_description: CLI provides translation & interpreting services in over 230 languages. Visit our language list by country page to help determine your language needs.
data.text:
Communicate in a Diverse World

With nearly 200 countries and up to 7,000 different languages spoken worldwide, itâ€™s more important than ever to communicate globally.

Our table below reflects a list of the most commonly spoken languages by country.

CLI provides professional interpreters for the languages in bold.
